data.title: Potpourri of Science Fiction Literature
data.meta_description: Here's my exhaustive log since 2007:  -----2024----- 1.     Hostile Waters - Peter Hutchausen 2.     The Last Train to Paradise - Les Standi...
data.text:
Here's my exhaustive log since 2007:

-----2024-----

1. Hostile Waters - Peter Hutchausen

2. The Last Train to Paradise - Les Standiford

3. The Cadaver of Gideon Wyck - Alexander Laing

4. The Year 2000 – Harry Harrison (editor)

5. The Ministry for the Future – Kim Stanley Robinson
